synopsis.text:
And so begins the whimsical tale of Lucius Modestus, an accomplished bath architect from the grandeur of the Roman Empire, who inadvertently stumbles upon a hidden portal in the depths of a bustling bathhouse, catapulting him through time and space to the serene sanctuaries of modern-day Japanese bath culture.

As Lucius grapples with the bewildering intricacies of 21st-century Japan, he finds solace and inspiration in the tranquil oases of its bathhouses. Enthralled by the myriad innovations and the soothing ambiance, Lucius's creative spirit is rekindled, and he embarks on a quest to bring these marvels back to his own time.

But integrating the advanced Japanese bathing concepts into ancient Roman architecture proves to be a formidable challenge. Undeterred, Lucius perseveres, driven by the tantalizing prospect of revolutionizing his profession and reclaiming his tarnished reputation.

Based on the beloved manga by Mari Yamazaki, this delightful comedy interweaves historical and contemporary bathing cultures, presenting a fresh take on the original work while also introducing new episodes penned by Yamazaki herself. Join Lucius on his exhilarating journey through time, as he navigates the complexities of cultural exchange and the pursuit of artistic excellence in this heartwarming and hilarious tale.
